did.abstract: A bill of lading for one chest of merchandise and one enslaved person to be delivered to the Port of Monto Cristo by Captain John Waddell, Jr. on board the Brigantine Sivan (or Swan) leaving from the Harbor of New York, N.Y. The document is dated October 20, 1759.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The item was formally accessioned in 1977.
